scripts.build: npm run build -w packages/sdk && cp packages/sdk/dist/fog.iife.js packages/worker/public/t.js && npm run build -w packages/worker
scripts.test: npm run test -w packages/sdk && npm run test -w packages/worker
scripts.typecheck: npm run typecheck -w packages/sdk && npm run typecheck -w packages/worker
scripts.release: npm run typecheck && npm test && npm run build && npm publish -w packages/sdk --access public
